sourcesContent:
<template>
  Home
</template>

<script>

import {inject, onMounted, onUnmounted, ref} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "Home",

  setup: function () {
    let mqttClient = null

    onMounted(() => {
      inject('mqttClient')
          .then((client) => {
            mqttClient = client
            
            setupClient()
          })
          .catch((err) => {
            console.log(err)
          });
    })

    /**
     * Execute when the component is unmounted
     */
    onUnmounted(()=> {
      cleanClient()
    })

    function setupClient() {
      if (mqttClient) {
        mqttClient.subscribe('test')
        console.log("subscribed to test")
      }
    }

    function cleanClient() {
      if(mqttClient){
        mqttClient.unsubscribe('test')
        console.log("unsubscribed from test")
      }
    }

  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
